title: 'You don’t belong in this country': Police kick, use racist slurs against Muslim women in Netherlands
summary_full: Two Muslim women in Utrecht, Netherlands, have filed a formal complaint after a police officer was filmed kicking and hitting them. The women's lawyer stated the officer also used racist language. Police are investigating the incident, acknowledging the video's impact and questions about racism.
